name: Black Panther
origin: T'Challa, the king of Wakanda, who gains superhuman abilities from the Heart-Shaped Herb and dons the mantle of the Black Panther.
powers: Superhuman strength, agility, and senses, vibranium suit providing enhanced durability and combat capabilities, and expert hand-to-hand combatant.
events: Defending Wakanda, joining the Avengers, and confronting Killmonger.
